headline: GE Vernova (GEV): Reassessing Valuation After Jefferies Upgrade, Higher Targets, Bigger Buyback and Dividend Hike
summary: GE Vernova (GEV) just gave investors a fresh catalyst by pairing a Jefferies upgrade with higher long term revenue targets, a doubled dividend, and an expanded buyback that underscore management’s confidence in AI driven power demand. See our latest analysis for GE Vernova. That backdrop helps explain why the stock has been so volatile in recent sessions, yet still sports a powerful year to date share price return of around 94 percent and a roughly 92 percent one year total shareholder...
